title: Insight into the brain's hidden depths: Scientists develop minimally invasive probe

title_detail.value: Insight into the brain's hidden depths: Scientists develop minimally invasive probe

summary: This could be a major step towards a better understanding of the functions of deeply hidden brain compartments, such as the formation of memories, as well as related dysfunctions, including Alzheimer's disease. Researchers have succeeded in using a hair-thin fiber endoscope to gain insights into hardly-accessible brain structures.
